DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim research study compare efficacy ( reduction HbA1c blood glucose level ) insulin detemir daily injection compare insulin detemir twice daily injection administer basal insulin treatment type 1 diabetes verify safety use ( number severity episodes hypoglycemia , body weight side effect ) .
